name: pear-maven-plugin
short_description: While searching for usefull solutions to utlize pear channels with maven I could not find any usefull plugin which utilzes pear to install and upgrade pear packages. The major drawback of pear is that it does not suppert a proper versioning. It is not possible to install packages based on a major or minor version so I'v decided to create a maven plugin which adds this functionality to pear. Additionally it should be possibe to define different channels and multiple packeges which could be installed and upgraded by a single command instead of manually typing this stuff again and agin...
summary: Maven 3 plugin which adds versioning and handlig of multiple chto pear
